Text: Thank you so much for posting these!!!  Where I live I can't get Current and the chance to watch Keith again every night is greatly appreciated.  Cheers, mate!!!
Will you be adding a torrent for Friday June 24th?

@BoonesFerry

I am reposting these torrents from demonoid for those that want them.
I am not the one doing the recording and encoding.

If the episodes appear I will certainly help in bringing them to TPB but I can't promise anything.

@skepticink Thank you. When I last looked for Friday's episode on demonoid it was not there. Guess I need to exercise more patience...I see it there now too. Thank you for sharing the torrent here on piratebay.
